scripts.build:win32: electron-packager . music-sync-server --overwrite --asar --ignore installer --ignore dist --ignore build --ignore .idea --build-version 1.0.2.0 --platform win32  --arch ia32 --out=dist/windows --icon=build/icon.ico --win32metadata.FileDescription "Music Sync Server" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename MusicSync.exe --win32metadata.ProductName "Music Sync Server" --win32metadata.InternalName music-sync-server
scripts.build:win64: electron-packager . music-sync-server --overwrite --asar --ignore installer --ignore dist --ignore build --ignore .idea --build-version 1.0.2.0 --platform win32  --arch x64  --out=dist/windows --icon=build/icon.ico --win32metadata.FileDescription "Music Sync Server" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename MusicSync.exe --win32metadata.ProductName "Music Sync Server" --win32metadata.InternalName music-sync-server

scripts.build:linux64: electron-packager . music-sync-server --overwrite --asar --ignore installer --ignore dist --ignore build --ignore .idea --build-version 1.0.2.0 --platform linux  --arch x64  --out=dist/linux   --icon=build/icon.ico
